why.heading: Why Choose
why.sub: All our services are conducted entirely online ‚Äî no office visits required. We stay in close communication via Email, TEAMS/Zoom, and WhatsApp to guide you at every step.

features.title: Expert Counsellors with Industry Insight
features.description: Our team consists of seasoned professionals with extensive experience in both academics and industry, providing you with well-rounded and practical guidance.

features.title: Personalized Attention
features.description: We work with a limited number of students per semester, ensuring each applicant receives dedicated time and support for a strong application strategy.

features.title: Support Across All Academic Levels
features.description: Whether you're applying for an Undergraduate, Master's, MBA, or Ph.D., we offer tailored assistance that meets the unique requirements of each program level.

features.title: Wide Range of Study Fields
features.description: Our expertise spans diverse disciplines, helping students from various academic backgrounds in finding the best-fit programs and universities.

features.title: Opportunities for Tuition-Free Education
features.description: We help identify programs and institutions that offer tuition-free or low-cost education, increasing your chances of an affordable, high-quality education in Europe.

features.title: End-to-End Support
features.description: From application to onboarding and settling in, we stand by your side throughout your educational journey.

additional_highlights.specialization_text: We focus on top universities across Europe, providing insights into regional requirements, culture, and opportunities to help you pick the right destination.
additional_highlights.online_text: All services are delivered online. We'll be in touch via Email, TEAMS/Zoom, and WhatsApp for document reviews, mock interviews, application tracking, and onboarding help.

footer.about: Your strategic partner for German education. We transform dreams into successful admissions with proven strategies and expert guidance.

hero.heading: About Profiberater
hero.subHeading: We are a team of seasoned professionals, originally from India and now living and working across Europe for over a decade. This unique blend of cultural understanding and international experience allows us to support Indian students like no one else can.

story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Having started our own journeys as international students 10‚Äì15 years ago, we have first-hand knowledge of the challenges, decisions, and transitions involved. Today, we are established professionals across diverse industries and domains in Europe.
Our background enables us to bridge the gap between aspiring Indian students' aspirations and European academic and career systems with clarity and empathy.

Over the past two years, we have offered personalized counselling to a limited group of students‚Äîfree of charge‚Äîevery semester, gaining valuable insights and refining our approach. With this experience and confidence, we are now expanding our services in a more structured and professional way.

values.title: Our Mission
values.description: To guide and support you in pursuing your passion through personalized counselling and our deep experience in the education industry.

values.title: Our Vision
values.description: Empowering every student to pursue their passions with confidence, equipping them to realize their full potential and soar toward success.

values.title: Our Approach
values.description: We don't just consult ‚Äî we mentor, guide, and walk alongside you, navigating through every step of your educational journey abroad.

cta.sub: Let us help you turn your German education dream into reality.

hero.title: Disclaimer & Policy
hero.subtitle: Important legal information about our services, data protection, and terms of engagement.

policies.title: Privacy Policy
content: We collect only necessary information for providing our services.
Your data is protected with industry-standard security measures.
We do not share your personal information with third parties without consent.
You can request data deletion at any time.

policies.title: Terms of Service
content: Our services are advisory in nature.
We provide guidance but cannot guarantee university admissions.
Clients are responsible for their own applications and documents.
Fees are for services rendered, not admission guarantees.

policies.title: Data Protection
content: SSL encryption for all data transmission.

policies.title: Important Disclaimers
content: We are not affiliated with any German universities or government bodies.
Admission decisions are made solely by universities.
Visa approvals are at the discretion of German authorities.
Test scores and academic performance are student responsibilities.

additional.title: Service Understanding
paragraphs: Educational Consulting Nature: We provide educational consulting and advisory services. We offer guidance, support, and expertise in the German education system but do not guarantee admissions, scholarships, or visa approvals.

Client Responsibilities: Students are responsible for their academic performance, test scores, document preparation, and meeting all application deadlines. We provide guidance but the execution remains with the student.

Third-Party Services: While we partner with training institutes and other service providers, we are not directly responsible for their services. Any agreements with third-party providers are between the student and the provider.
Policy Updates: We reserve the right to update our policies and terms. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

contact.title: Questions About Our Policies?
contact.subtitle: Contact us for any clarification regarding our policies and terms.

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.description: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. These terms govern your relationship with Profiberater.

notice.title: Important Legal Notice
notice.text: These Terms of Service constitute a legally binding agreement between you and Profiberater. By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our services.

content.subtitle: Acceptance of Terms
points: By accessing our services, you agree to be bound by these terms
Services are available only to individuals who are at least 18 years old
We reserve the right to update these terms at any time
Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance

content.subtitle: Service Description
points: Assistance with accommodation and financial services

content.subtitle: Accurate Information
points: Provide complete and accurate personal information
Update information promptly when changes occur

content.subtitle: Prohibited Activities
points: Violation of German or Indian laws

content.subtitle: Service Limitations
points: We provide guidance but cannot guarantee university admissions
Visa approvals are at the discretion of German authorities
Service outcomes depend on individual circumstances
Third-party services are subject to their terms

content.subtitle: Financial Disclaimers
points: Loan approvals depend on lender criteria
Exchange rates for forex services may fluctuate
Insurance coverage subject to provider terms
Fees are for services rendered, not outcomes

content.subtitle: Fee Structure
points: Service fees are clearly communicated upfront
Additional costs for third-party services may apply
Payment plans available for certain services
All fees are in Indian Rupees unless specified

content.subtitle: Refund Policy
points: Partial refunds based on service completion stage
No refunds after service delivery completion
Refund requests must be submitted in writing

governing.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
paragraphs: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Delhi, India.
Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

intro.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Profiberater ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and disclosed by Profiberater.

This policy applies to our website and its associated subdomains (collectively, our "Service") alongside our application, Profiberater. By accessing or using our Service, you agree to the collection, storage, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in this Privacy Policy and our Terms of Service.

blocks.subtitle: Security Measures
points: SSL encryption for all data transmission

blocks.subtitle: Data Retention
points: Service data: 7 years after service completion
Financial records: 10 years as per Indian law

blocks.subtitle: Access and Control
points: Right to access your personal data
Right to delete your data (with limitations)

hero.subtitle: We are your one-stop source for all your training needs. Access our network of premium training partners with exclusive discounts.

headings.compGuideKicker: Comparative Guide to English Proficiency Tests
headings.ctaSub: Register with us to unlock exclusive discounts and connect with our premium training partners.

paragraphs: While we do not provide training directly, we have partnerships with well-established professional institutes that have a strong track record of successfully training students.
These institutes are known for guiding learners effectively to achieve higher scores, which in turn enhances their profiles and supports their admission process.
By applying for admission through us, you may also become eligible for exclusive discounts.
coaching.accessReqText: Access to our partner program is available only after you register with us. Once registered, you will be able to view and connect with our training partners directly through your personal profile.

rows.modes: Only at a Test Centre, Only Computer-delivered
rows.avail: Every day (depends on the test centre)
rows.scoring: Only automated, Overall: out of 90, Individual modules: out of 90
rows.types: S: 5 types, W: 2 types, R: 5 types, L: 8 types

rows.modes: Only at a Test Centre, Paper-based and Computer-delivered
rows.sessions: Two sessions: 1 for LRW, 1 for S
rows.avail: CDT: every day, PBT: 4-5 times a month
rows.reg: CDT: 4-5 days in advance, PBT: up to 15 days in advance
rows.scoring: Both human and automated, Overall: out of band 9.0, Individual modules: out of band 9.0
rows.types: L: 8-9 types, R: 10-12 types, W: 2 types, S: 3 parts

rows.full: Test of English as a Foreign Language
rows.modes: At a Test Centre and At Home, Paper-based and Computer-delivered
rows.sessions: Single session at test centre or Home edition, Two sessions for Paper edition
rows.avail: At test centre: 60+ times a year, Home edition: 24 hrs / 4 days a week, Paper edition: once a month (3rd Saturday)
rows.reg: At test centre: 3-5 days in advance, Home edition: 1-2 days in advance, Paper edition: 7-10 days in advance
rows.scoring: Both human and automated, Overall: out of 120 points, Individual modules: out of 30 points
rows.results: At test centre: 4-8 days, Home edition: 4-8 days, Paper edition: 11-13 days
rows.types: R: MCQs, L: MCQs, S: 4 types, W: 2 types

rows.modules: Literacy - read and write, Comprehension - read and listen, Production - write and speak, Conversation - listen and speak [individual and integrated]
rows.modes: NOT at a Test Centre, From home or office, Only Computer-delivered
rows.types: S: 4-5 types, W: 4 types, R: 7-8 types, L: 4-5 types

rows.full: Canadian English Language Proficiency Index Program
rows.modules: Reading, Listening, Speaking, Writing [individual and integrated]
rows.modes: Only at a Test Centre, Only Computer-delivered
rows.reg: One business day before the test, Depends on seat availability
rows.scoring: Both human and automated, Overall: out of levels 3-12, Individual modules: out of levels 3-12
rows.types: L: 6 types, 38+ MCQs, R: 4 types, 38+ MCQs, S: 2 types, W: 8 types
rows.count: L: 6 parts, 38+ MCQs, R: 4 parts, 38+ MCQs, W: 2 parts, 2 questions, S: 8 parts, 8 questions

rows.purpose: College admissions (Canada); Student Visa (only CAEL at test centre) (Canada)
rows.modules: Speaking, Reading, Listening, Academic Unit A, Academic Unit B
rows.modes: At a Test Centre and At Home, Only Computer-delivered
rows.reg: One business day before the test, Depends on seat availability
rows.scoring: Both human and automated, Overall: out of Band 90, Individual modules: out of Band 90
rows.types: S: 3 types, R: 2 types + 1 R+S Integrated, L: 2 types + 1 L+S Integrated, W: 2 types (R+L+W Integrated)
rows.count: S: 3 questions, R: 14-25 MCQs + 1 R+S question, L: 14-25 MCQs + 1 L+S question, W: 44-60 MCQs + 2 R+L+W question
